healing.title: healing
healing.shortDescription: heal target unit for {{healthPerMinute}}/min at a range of {{range}}

chargedAttack.shortDescription: deals {{damage}} then recharge the attack over {{reloadTime}} s

fullMissedShot.shortDescription: missed shots that hit a target deal full damage instead of half

attackPassThrough.title: Attack passes through
